1.新建表
-- auto-generated definition
create table res_c_finance
(
  id                       varchar(50)                   not null
    primary key,
  busuuid                  varchar(50)                   null,
  busidate                 date                          null,
  status                   varchar(50)                   null,
  processuserid            varchar(50)                   null,
  processusername          varchar(100)                  null,
  tbelongcomp              varchar(50)                   null,
  tbelongpart              varchar(50)                   null,
  tbuyprice                decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  tnetworth                decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  tresidualvalue           decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  taccumulateddepreciation decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  mark                     varchar(50)                   null,
  dr                       varchar(1)                    null,
  create_time              datetime                      null,
  create_by                varchar(50)                   null,
  update_time              datetime                      null,
  update_by                varchar(50)                   null
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table res_c_finance_item
(
  id                       varchar(50)                   not null
    primary key,
  busuuid                  varchar(50)                   null,
  resid                    varchar(50)                   null,
  fbelongcomp              varchar(50)                   null,
  tbelongcomp              varchar(50)                   null,
  fbelongpart              varchar(50)                   null,
  tbelongpart              varchar(50)                   null,
  fbuyprice                decimal(10, 2)                null,
  tbuyprice                decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  fnetworth                decimal(10, 2)                null,
  tnetworth                decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  fresidualvalue           decimal(10, 2)                null,
  tresidualvalue           decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  faccumulateddepreciation decimal(10, 2)                null,
  taccumulateddepreciation decimal(10, 2) default '0.00' null,
  dr                       varchar(1)                    null,
  create_time              datetime                      null,
  create_by                varchar(50)                   null,
  update_time              datetime                      null,
  update_by                varchar(50)                   null
);




-- auto-generated definition
create table res_c_maintenance_item
(
  id                       varchar(50)                   not null
    primary key,
  busuuid                  varchar(50)                   null,
  resid                    varchar(50)                   null,
  fwb              varchar(50)                   null,
  fwbsupplier              varchar(50)                   null,
  fwbauto                  varchar(50)                   null,
  fwbct                    varchar(50)                   null,
  fwboutdate      date,
  twb              varchar(50)                   null,
  twbsupplier              varchar(50)                   null,
  twbauto                  varchar(50)                   null,
  twbct                    varchar(50)                   null,
  twboutdate      date,
  mark varchar(100),
  dr                       varchar(1)                    null,
  create_time              datetime                      null,
  create_by                varchar(50)                   null,
  update_time              datetime                      null,
  update_by                varchar(50)                   null
);
